issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Fix gandiva date_diff function definitions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8412](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8412). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current gandiva date functions date_diff, date_sub definitions take integer as first argument and date as second argument:

date_diff(10, d) = d - 10, which seems unintuitive.
